text: In My Father's House may refer to: * "In My Father's House" (song), by The Blackwood Brothers, later recorded by Elvis Presley *In My Father's House (novel), by Ernest J. Gaines *In My Father's House (film), a Moroccan film and winner of the 1998 Golden Calf for Best Long Documentary *In My Father's House (Ann Rinaldi novel), by Ann Rinaldi
title: In My Father's House
